about_the_game:
Join the battle between two peasant kingdoms and utilize whatever means necessary to ensure victory! Define your playstyle by mastering the in-depth 2D hand-to-hand combat mechanics, building vehicles with high firepower, or by casting powerful magic spells from the backline for a more supportive role.


Take control of your personal magic wand -companion to quickly construct castles and vehicles. You can make everything from small agile contraptions to humongous air-bases. Attach weaponry and other useful items to create mobile war machines capable of quickly getting friendly peasants into combat and delivering destruction from above.




Everything is destructible! Collapse big castles, dig tunnels, burn houses, and blow up vehicles by using magic spells and other tools at your disposal. Flying vehicles with enough momentum are also an excellent source of destruction, but remember to make them sturdy enough!



Select a combination of weapons that fit your combat style the best! You can dual wield swords or even shields if feeling extra defensive. Each weapon has its own unique ability that synergizes with other abilities. Peasants also have access to one wildcard ability of their choosing, and a generic purpose kick to use in various ways such as nudging vehicles and parrying attacks.



Use your magic wand to cast powerful spells varying from lingering area-of-effect zones to controllable projectiles.

short_description: Dive into chaotic PvP combat in this 2D team-vs-team game with up to 24 players! Build vehicles and strike down the opposing kingdom's peasants in a spectacular fashion by using vehicle-mounted cannons, magic spells, or simply by outperforming them in hand-to-hand combat!
